description.zh-cn: 民国时期的政治家、外交家、金融家，宋氏家族成员之一。
description.en: A politician, diplomat, and financier during the Republic of China era, a member of the Soong family.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任国民政府主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的妹妹，蒋中正的妻子。
description.en: T. V. Soong's younger sister and the wife of Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国南京国民政府行政院长兼财政部长，宋子文的姐夫。
description.en: A Chinese banker and politician in the Republic of China, and brother-in-law of T. V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的大姐，孔祥熙的妻子。
description.en: T. V. Soong's eldest sister and the wife of H. H. Kung.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家，中国国民党创始人，中华民国国父。宋子文的二姐夫。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, physician, and political philosopher who served as the provisional first president of the Republic of China and the first leader of the Kuomintang. Brother-in-law of T. V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的二姐，孙中山的妻子。
description.en: T. V. Soong's second eldest sister and the wife of Sun Yat-sen.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的父亲，美南监理会牧师及富商，孙中山革命支持者。
description.en: Father of T. V. Soong, a Methodist minister, businessman, and supporter of Sun Yat-sen's revolution.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of T. V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文的妻子。
description.en: Wife of T. V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的一所大学，宋子文曾在此就读。
description.en: A university in Shanghai where T. V. Soong studied.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一所私立研究型大学，宋子文于此获得经济学学位。
description.en: A private research university in the United States where T. V. Soong earned a degree in economics.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一所私立研究型大学，宋子文曾在此就读研究所。
description.en: A private research university in the United States where T. V. Soong attended graduate school.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The executive branch of the government of the Republic of China.

en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管外交事务的部门。
description.en: The ministry of the Republic of China that manages foreign affairs.

en: Ministry of Finance of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管财政事务的部门。
description.en: The ministry of the Republic of China that manages fiscal affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任国民政府主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的主要银行之一，宋子文曾任董事长。
description.en: One of the major banks during the Republic of China era, where T. V. Soong served as Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 1936年12月，张学良和杨虎城在西安发动的“兵谏”事件，宋子文曾飞赴西安参与谈判调解。
description.en: A political crisis that took place in Xi'an in December 1936, where Chiang Kai-shek was detained by his generals Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng. T. V. Soong flew to Xi'an to participate in the negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，西安事变发动者之一，与宋子文是好友。
description.en: A warlord of the Republic of China, one of the initiators of the Xi'an Incident, and a friend of T. V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 美国财政部长，与宋子文签订五亿美元借款协议。
description.en: The U.S. Secretary of the Treasury who signed a $500 million loan agreement with T. V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名学者、思想家、外交家。曾在日记中对宋子文有负面评价。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher, writer, and diplomat. He expressed negative opinions about T. V. Soong in his diary.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的国际组织，宋子文曾作为中国首席代表出席其成立大会。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization whose stated purposes are to maintain international peace and security. T. V. Soong attended its founding conference as China's chief delegate.

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人，曾与宋子文会谈并签订《中苏友好同盟条约》。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet Union who met with T. V. Soong to sign the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance.

en: Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance

description.zh-cn: 中华民国与苏联签订的条约，由宋子文代表中方签订。
description.en: A treaty signed between the Republic of China and the Soviet Union, with T. V. Soong signing on behalf of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统，曾与宋子文会面，并被引述有争议的负面评价。
description.en: The 33rd U.S. President who met with T. V. Soong and was quoted with controversial negative remarks about him.

description.zh-cn: 1947年初因国民政府开放黄金自由买卖政策失败而导致的恶性通货膨胀和金融混乱事件，直接导致时任行政院长宋子文下台。
description.en: A financial crisis involving hyperinflation and market chaos in early 1947, caused by the failure of the Nationalist Government's gold sales policy, which directly led to the resignation of then-Premier T. V. Soong.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、教育家，曾撰文猛烈抨击宋子文的财经政策。
description.en: A Chinese historian and educator who wrote articles fiercely criticizing T. V. Soong's financial policies.

nodes.id: 这个样子的宋子文非走开不可

zh-cn: 这个样子的宋子文非走开不可
en: This kind of T. V. Soong must go

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年发表于《世纪评论》的文章，抨击宋子文的政策并要求其下台。
description.en: An article published by Fu Sinian in 'Century Review' criticizing T. V. Soong's policies and demanding his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国广东省的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Guangdong Province during the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海市的医院，是宋子文的出生地。
description.en: A hospital in Shanghai, the birthplace of T. V. Soong.

nodes.id: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统，曾与宋子文会谈并表示愿意向中国提供援助。
description.en: The 32nd U.S. President, who met with T. V. Soong and expressed willingness to provide aid to China.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪初期中国一个著名的家族，成员在政治、经济等领域有重要影响。
description.en: A prominent Chinese family in the early 20th century, whose members were influential in politics, finance, and other fields.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是宋嘉澍的儿子。
description.en: T. V. Soong is the son of Song Jiashu.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文于1928年与张乐怡结婚。
description.en: T. V. Soong married Zhang Leyi in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 宋霭龄是宋子文的大姐。
description.en: Soong Ai-ling is T. V. Soong's eldest sister.

description.zh-cn: 宋庆龄是宋子文的二姐。
description.en: Soong Ching-ling is T. V. Soong's second eldest sister.

description.zh-cn: 宋美龄是宋子文的妹妹。
description.en: Soong Mei-ling is T. V. Soong's younger sister.

description.zh-cn: 宋子良是宋子文的弟弟。
description.en: Song Ziliang is T. V. Soong's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是蒋中正的妻兄（大舅子）。
description.en: T. V. Soong was Chiang Kai-shek's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是孔祥熙的妻弟。
description.en: T. V. Soong was H. H. Kung's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是孙中山的妻弟。
description.en: T. V. Soong was Sun Yat-sen's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 早年于上海圣约翰大学求学。
description.en: Studied at St. John's University in Shanghai in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 1915年于哈佛大学经济学毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Harvard University with a degree in economics in 1915.

description.zh-cn: 在哥伦比亚大学研究所就读。
description.en: Attended graduate school at Columbia University.

description.zh-cn: 1923年起，宋子文担任孙中山的英文秘书。
description.en: Beginning in 1923, T. V. Soong served as Sun Yat-sen's English Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文曾多次担任行政院副院长、代理院长及院长职务。
description.en: T. V. Soong served multiple times as Vice Premier, Acting Premier, and Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 1933年，宋子文因在军费及预算问题上与蒋介石发生激烈冲突，甚至被蒋掌掴，遂辞去财长等职务。
description.en: In 1933, T. V. Soong had a fierce conflict with Chiang Kai-shek over military spending and budget issues, was even slapped by Chiang, and subsequently resigned from his post as Minister of Finance.

description.zh-cn: 1935年4月起，宋子文接任中国银行董事长。
description.en: From April 1935, T. V. Soong took over as the Chairman of the Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文与张学良是好友，曾在西安事变中出面调解。
description.en: T. V. Soong and Zhang Xueliang were friends, and Soong mediated during the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文在西安事变时飞赴西安参与谈判调解。
description.en: During the Xi'an Incident, T. V. Soong flew to Xi'an to participate in negotiations and mediation.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文代表国民政府与时任美国财政部长摩根索签订了五亿美元借款协议。
description.en: T. V. Soong, on behalf of the Nationalist Government, signed a $500 million loan agreement with then-U.S. Secretary of the Treasury Henry Morgenthau Jr.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，宋子文赴苏联同斯大林会谈，并签订《中苏友好同盟条约》。
description.en: In 1945, T. V. Soong went to the Soviet Union to meet with Stalin and sign the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文代表中华民国政府签订了《中苏友好同盟条约》。
description.en: T. V. Soong signed the Sino-Soviet Treaty of Friendship and Alliance on behalf of the government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1947年初的黄金风潮引发金融混乱和舆论抨击，直接导致时任行政院长宋子文被迫辞职。
description.en: The Gold Price Crisis in early 1947 caused financial chaos and public criticism, directly leading to the resignation of then-Premier T. V. Soong.

relationships.target: 这个样子的宋子文非走开不可

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年撰写并发表文章《这个样子的宋子文非走开不可》，猛烈抨击宋子文。
description.en: Fu Sinian wrote and published the article 'This kind of T. V. Soong must go', fiercely criticizing T. V. Soong.

relationships.source: 这个样子的宋子文非走开不可

description.zh-cn: 傅斯年的文章在全国范围内引发舆论，要求宋子文下台，是导致其辞职的重要因素之一。
description.en: Fu Sinian's article sparked nationwide public opinion demanding T. V. Soong's resignation, becoming a significant factor in his departure.

description.zh-cn: 胡适在日记中评价宋子文为“如此自私自利的小人”，显示了对其个人的负面看法。
description.en: Hu Shih described T. V. Soong in his diary as 'such a selfish villain,' indicating a negative personal opinion of him.

description.zh-cn: 据称杜鲁门曾大骂宋家为“贼”，但此说法的真实性存疑。
description.en: Truman allegedly called the Soong family 'thieves,' although the authenticity of this claim is disputed.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文于1947年9月至1949年1月担任广东省政府主席。
description.en: T. V. Soong served as the Chairman of the Guangdong Provincial Government from September 1947 to January 1949.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文出生于上海市同仁医院。
description.en: T. V. Soong was born in Shanghai Tongren Hospital.

relationships.target: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 宋子文与时任美国总统罗斯福会谈，罗斯福表示愿意向中国提供援助。
description.en: T. V. Soong met with then-U.S. President Roosevelt, who expressed willingness to provide aid to China.

description.zh-cn: 宋子文是宋氏家族的核心成员之一。
description.en: T. V. Soong was one of the core members of the Soong family.
